entry.title: Today in DeFi - Levana Hacked for 1M, Merkle Trade V2 Live, Avalanche to Support Meme Coins , High Yield Stable Farms, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Gamified perp DEX Merkle Trade launches V2, introducing loot boxes, rewards for traders, and incentives for LPs. Today in DeFi is Now on Telegram Get notified of daily DeFi news, project analysis, early airdrops, farming opportunities, and many more as soon as we publish.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Avalanche Yeti Winding Down, zkFair Activates Fair Mode, Proposal to Unlock ONDO, Promising New Money Market with Airdrop Campaign , and more...
entry.summary: Updates 🆕 Fair-launched ZK L2 zkFair activated Fair Mode. Most new projects endorsed by ZKFair in the future will be launched with a very low valuation (~$1M) and in a 100% fair launch format. Arbitrum-based lending protocol Domomite launches Vote-Enabled ARB (vARB). vARB allows users to use ARB as collateral for borrowing while using it to participate in Arbitrum voting.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Rido Launches BnB Chain Attestation Service, KyberSwap Post-exploit Updates, Venus to Launch on Ethereum, Autocompounded Farming on Polygon , and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 DataFi protocol Rido launches BNB Attestation Service (BAS) on the BnB chain. BAS is an infrastructure for generating attestation to verify information. BAS assists users in on-chain or off-chain verification, allowing them to assert ownership of attestation by storing them in Greenfield.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Infinex Live on Base Mainnet, zkSync Era Network Issue, Neon EVM Launches Neon Points, Organic Stable Farming, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Built by Synthetix, the Infinex perp DEX launches on the Base mainnet. This is an alpha launch, and only 13 of the selected ambassadors will be able to trade on Infinex with a 1000 USDC grant. Today in DeFi is Now on Telegram Get notified of daily DeFi news, project analysis, early airdrops, farming opportunities, and many more as soon as we publish.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Renzo Restaking Live, Immutable Launches Passport, ZKX Launching on Starknet, Solend on Sui, and more...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Dec 18th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Gearbox V3 PURE Trading Live, Dencun Upgrade on Testnets, Single-Deposit Stable Farms, CEX-like Spot Trading with Airdrop Potential, and more...
entry.summary: Updates 🆕 Gearbox has enabled PURE Margin Trading on V3. PURE enables users to trade natively on Uniswap, Curve, and supported DEXes, and offers liquidity for leverage without having any LPs or counter-parties trade against you. Polytrade launches Phase 1 (private phase) of its RWA marketplace. The marketplace aggregates RWA protocols and RWAs in one platform, RWA

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Lumio Move L2 on Testnet, Phantom Supports Bitcoin, Fraxchain Airdrop+Points System Coming, Lending ETH for a High Yield, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Built by Pomtent Network, Lumio is the first Move L2 that is EVM-compatible, built using the OP Stack, and settles on Ethereum while leveraging Move VM, Aptos’ virtual machine. Lumio is now on testnet and will open up in waves to a whitelist of users over time.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - ZKFair Fair-launches zk-Rollup, Flooring Protocol 2M Exploit, Frame Airdrops NFT Traders, Leveraged Trade LST Yield, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 ZKFair launches its mainnet. ZKFair is a community-owned ZK L2 build using Polygon CDK, Celestia DA, and Lumoz RaaS. ZKFair adopts a 100% fair launch approach, all ZKF tokens will be airdropped to the community. Aori V1 is live on Arbitrum. Aori is a high-frequency orderbook that allows “flash market making”, connecting CeFi/DeFi arbitrageurs to MEV searchers, solvers, and DeFi-native market makers.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Gearbox V3 Live, Ipor Launches Stake Rate Swap, High-Yield Stable Farms, One-Click High-Yield Farming, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Gearbox V3 is live with PURE margin trading, new assets, and better organic rates. APYs depend on TVL migrated, and there is no new inflation in GEAR. ETH restaking protocol Renzo is live no EigenLayer. Renzo is the interface to the EigenLayer ecosystem securing Actively Validated Services (AVSs) and offering a higher yield than ETH staking.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Arbitrum One Outage, Gearbox v3 Upcoming, Innovative Stable Yield, Delta Neutral Farming with Airdrop Potential, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Web3 portfolio viewer vfat launches Yield, allowing users to compare yield products across DeFi, and enter and exit positions in one transaction. Updates 🆕 Infinex introduced Infinex Account, allowing users to create their account through social sign-in, and interact with Infinex.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Clearpool Prime on OP, LayerZero V2 on Testnet, Sturdy V2 Upcoming, IntentX Multiplier Points, and more...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Dec 11th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Lyra V2 Live, Ledger Library Exploit, Pendle V3 Upcoming, Trade LST Interest Rates with a Potential Catalyst, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Lyra launches V2, enabling trading for options, perpetual, and spots. Lyra also started the BTC PVP competition, allowing traders to earn PVPoints and win LYRA. Updates 🆕 LayerZero launches V2 on testnets, with mainnet releasing in 2024. V2 is an upgrade that increases network throughput and liveness while making it easier for developers to build and integrate dApps with LayerZero.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Redacted Cartel Pirex ETH on Mainnet, Pendle Introduces V3, High Organic Yield on Stables, Intent-based Shortcuts with Rewards, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Redacted Cartel launches the Pirex ETH (pxETH) on the Ethereum mainnet, marking the first phase of the Dinero rollout. Pirex ETH consists of pxETH and apxETH, giving users two choices: pxETH for liquidity or apxETH for boosted staking yield.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - SSV Permissionless Mainnet Live, Conic Finance to Launch V2, High-Yield Stable Farm on Kava, Access Solana DeFi with EVM Wallet, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 DVT network SSV launched its permissionless mainnet, removing the limitation that restricts the onboarding of validators and operators only to launch partners. Clearpool launches Clearpool Prime on OP Mainnet. Prime allows whitelisted, institutional borrowers to launch pools with tailored terms and invite similarly whitelisted lenders to participate.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Poolshark Live on Arbitrum, Uniswap Expands to Bitcoin Sidechain, Sen. Warren Introduces Anti-Crypto Bill, Bridging to Solana with Ease, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Poolshark launched on Arbitrum mainnet along with its token sale. Poolshark Protocol is an AMM that enables directional LPing. Powered by Wormhole, Circle, and Base, Pike Finance launches testnet on Ethereum, Optimism, Arbitrum, and Base L2. Pike is a cross-chain lending protocol that offers lending, leverage, and Earn services.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Lyra Chain Live, Synthetix Voting to End Inflation, LayerZero Confirms Token, Low-Risk LPing with Airdrop, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Options protocol Lyra launches Lyra Chain, an OP stack-powered L2 providing high throughput, low-cost settlement of transactions. Upcoming ⏳ Synthetix Spartan Council is voting to end SNX inflation. If approved, SNX inflation will be reduced to zero in the claim week following the vote.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - QuickSwap Bonds Live, Liquity Introduces Desktop Frontend, LSDfi Apollo Launching on Neutron, Kamino Points Coming, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Dec 4th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Gyroscope Launches GYD Stablecoin, Safe Introduces Recovery Hub , Marginfi to Launch Solana LST-backed Stablecoin, High Yield Staking on Avalanche, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Gyroscope launches GYD, a dollar-pegged stablecoin backed by reserve assets, and features an algorithmic mechanism to keep its price pegged to $1. Users can now mint GYD or provide liquidity to GYD pools. Crypto Volatility Index launches CVI V4, introducing new features such as the Hedged Theta Vault, a ~3x stretched version of the CVI, borrower leverage, etc.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aevo Launches Yield-Bearing aeUSD, Worldcoin Decentralizing, New Lending Pool with OP Rewards, No Fee Swaps with Airdrop, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Aevo launches aeUSD, a yield-bearing stables-denominated collateral asset (5% USDC and 95% sDAI) that allows users to earn a 4.75% APY on their exchange margin while trading with 20x leverage. QuickSwap launches QuickSwap Bonds on the DEX, a new way for liquidity provision. Users can provide liquidity and receive tokens at a discount that vest over time, represented by a Bond NFT.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Helium Launches $20 Unlimited Mobile Plans, Matcha Launches Cross-chain Swaps, Premia Blue Season, Upcoming Airdrop on Solana, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Helium Mobile launches a nationwide plan in the US. with unlimited data, text, and talk that costs $20 a month. Helium Mobile combines the Solana-based IoT project Helium Network and a nationwide 5G network. Hashflow DEX launches 2.0. The upgraded version enables Smart Order Routing (SOR), improved UX, and Solana expansion.
